doc.title: 'O puorco
doc.plot: The sacrifice of pig in some ancient ethnic group from the south of Italy, to represent the brutality of human beings rooted in every aspect of our contemporary society. We see one of the primitive and archaic human behaviour that has driven his struggle for life, the killing of other species. Everyone at the same time are the executor and the victim of themselves.
